inclusion.criterion: signed informed consent for EG-EUS, CE-EUS and FNA biopsy
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: prior surgical treatment with curative intent or chemo-radiotherapy

notes: Patient has a history of CAD and recently noted abdominal mass. She presents with fevers/rigors and bandemia. CT abdomen showed a large heterogeneous left upper abdominal mass consistent with pancreatic adenocarcinoma.
